gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: Wind direction (from which blowing) @ Specified height level above ground
Wind speed @ Specified height level above ground
Probability of 0.01 inch of precipitation (POP) (12_Hour Average) @ Ground or water surface layer
Maximum temperature (12_Hour Maximum) @ Specified height level above ground
Minimum temperature (12_Hour Minimum) @ Specified height level above ground
Total cloud cover @ Entire atmosphere layer layer
Dewpoint temperature @ Specified height level above ground
Categorical Rain @ Ground or water surface

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: This URL provides a standard OPeNDAP html interface for selecting data from this dataset. Change the extension to .info for a description of the dataset.
This URL provides an NCDC climate and weather toolkit view of an OPeNDAP resource.
